card.name: Sun Titan
card.property: Vigilance Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A blazing sun that never sets.

card.name: Somberwald Vigilante
card.property: Whenever Somberwald Vigilante becomes blocked by a creature, Somberwald Vigilante deals 1 damage to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has nothing left but his resentment.

card.name: Figure of Destiny
card.property: {R/W}: Figure of Destiny becomes a Kithkin Spirit with base power and toughness 2/2. {R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Spirit, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior with base power and toughness 4/4. {R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Warrior, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior Avatar with base power and toughness 8/8, flying, and first strike.

card.name: Cavalry Pegasus
card.property: Flying Whenever Cavalry Pegasus attacks, each attacking Human gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is hope, hooved and winged." —Cymede, queen of Akros

card.name: Fencing Ace
card.property: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.

card.name: Thraben Valiant
card.property: Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once more into Devil's Breach, soldiers. I want another devil tail for my collection."

card.name: Stun Sniper
card.property: {1}, {T}: Stun Sniper deals 1 damage to target creature. Tap that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tips of her bolts are blunt, but her aim is deadly sharp.

card.name: Truefire Paladin
card.property: Vigilance {R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gets +2/+0 until end of turn. {R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Auramancer
card.property: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

card.name: Freewind Equenaut
card.property: Flying As long as Freewind Equenaut is enchanted, it has "{T}: Freewind Equenaut deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Confront her, and feel the hooves of her steed. Ignore her, and feel the sting of her arrow.

card.name: Anax and Cymede
card.property: First strike, vigilance Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Anax and Cymede, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Akros's greatest heroes are also its royalty.

card.name: Armory Guard
card.property: Armory Guard has vigilance as long as you control a Gate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Dimir agents watched from the shadows. "Eight hours, and I've yet to see him blink," Nefara hissed. "I suggest we find another way in."

card.name: Gustcloak Sentinel
card.property: Whenever Gustcloak Sentinel becomes blocked, you may untap it and remove it from combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Entire platoons have mysteriously vanished from battle, leaving enemy weapons to slice through empty air.

card.name: Dawnstrike Paladin
card.property: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She crushes darkness beneath her charger's hooves.

card.name: Nobilis of War
card.property: Flying Attacking creatures you control get +2/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A great siege is a banquet to him; a long and terrible battle, the most exquisite delicacy." —The Seer's Parables

card.name: Kamahl, Pit Fighter
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) {T}: Kamahl, Pit Fighter deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In times when freedom seems lost, great souls arise to reclaim it.

card.name: Condemn
card.property: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now." —Alovnek, Boros guildmage

card.name: Daily Regimen
card.property: Enchant creature {1}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What self-indulgence tears down, discipline builds up again.

card.name: Pay No Heed
card.property: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My course is before me. There is nothing behind me."

card.name: Righteousness
card.property: Target blocking creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the greatest strength is the strength of conviction.

card.name: Stand Firm
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Magma Jet
card.property: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Scry 2.

card.name: Ordeal of Purphoros
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros. When you sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Bonds of Faith
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Human. Otherwise, it can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What cannot be destroyed will be bound." —Oath of Avacyn

card.name: Moment of Heroism
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My faith is stronger than fang, claw, or mindless hunger."

card.name: Undying Rage
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block. When Undying Rage is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Undying Rage to its owner's hand.

card.name: Battle Mastery
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Boom! Boom! Boots the size of oxcarts, then an axe like a falling sun. Elves scattered. Trees scattered. Even the hills ran for the hills!" —Clachan Tales

card.name: Griffin Guide
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying. When enchanted creature dies, create a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying.

card.name: Smite the Monstrous
card.property: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though the old holy wards and roadside shrines have begun to fail, faith in Avacyn still holds true power.

card.name: Miraculous Recovery
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the rock of the polis. Death only strengthens me."

card.name: Winds of Rath
card.property: Destroy all creatures that aren't enchanted. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There shall be a vast shout and then a vaster silence." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Pyrokinesis
card.property: You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay Pyrokinesis's mana cost. Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

card.name: Boros Guildgate
card.property: Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter with merciful hearts. Exit with battle cries.

card.name: New Benalia
card.property: New Benalia enters the battlefield tapped. When New Benalia enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Polukranos, World Eater
Orcish Lumberjack
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Add three mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wood is wasted in the dirt." —Orcish proverb

card.name: Deadly Recluse
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even dragons fear its silken strands.

card.name: Kavu Predator
card.property: Trample Whenever an opponent gains life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Kavu Predator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a withered world, the scent of healthy prey is enough to drive a predator to frenzy.

card.name: Satyr Hedonist
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Satyr Hedonist: Add {R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any festival you can walk away from wasn't worth attending in the first place."

card.name: Zhur-Taa Druid
card.property: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Whenever you tap Zhur-Taa Druid for mana, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the decadent think magic should be pristine and without cost."

card.name: Blood Ogre
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

card.name: Troll Ascetic
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) {1}{G}: Regenerate Troll Ascetic.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's no coincidence that the oldest trolls are also the angriest.

card.name: Crowned Ceratok
card.property: Trample Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best way to calm a rampaging ceratok is to wait until it dies of natural causes.

card.name: Gorehorn Minotaurs
card.property: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some of the eleven minotaur clans of Mirtiin are expert crafters and learned philosophers. Others just like to hit stuff.

card.name: Ghor-Clan Savage
card.property: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The snap of sinew. The crunch of bone. A cry for mercy. These are the music of the Gruul.

card.name: Deus of Calamity
card.property: Trample Whenever Deus of Calamity deals 6 or more damage to an opponent, destroy target land that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He bears the marks of ages upon his skin, memories of dreams long dead and best left buried." —The Seer's Parables

card.name: Conquering Manticore
card.property: Flying When Conquering Manticore enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It speaks no commands but is always obeyed.

card.name: Crater Hellion
card.property: Echo {4}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Crater Hellion enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to each other creature.

card.name: Skarrgan Firebird
card.property: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.) Flying {R}{R}{R}: Return Skarrgan Firebird from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if an opponent was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Valley Rannet
card.property: Mountaincycling {2}, forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Krosan Tusker
card.property: Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Skarrgan Skybreaker
card.property: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.) {1}, Sacrifice Skarrgan Skybreaker: Skarrgan Skybreaker deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sky isn't falling—it's being thrown at us!" —Otak, Tin Street shopkeep

card.name: Shower of Sparks
card.property: Shower of Sparks deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The viashino had learned how to operate the rig through trial and error—mostly error.

card.name: Prey Upon
card.property: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You don't find many old werewolf hunters." —Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

card.name: Pyroclasm
card.property: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who'd want to ignite things one at a time?" —Chandra Nalaar

card.name: Regrowth
card.property: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While the root remains, the tree yet lives.

card.name: Terrifying Presence
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by creatures other than target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elmut had slaughtered vampires, slain werewolves, and destroyed hordes of zombies. Sadly, he never got over his fear of spiders.

card.name: Destructive Revelry
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Destructive Revelry deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stoke a fire hot enough and you'll never run out of things to burn." —Xenagos, the Reveler

card.name: Dragon Blood
card.property: {3}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single drop turns skin to scale and fist to claw.

card.name: Volt Charge
card.property: Volt Charge deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

card.name: Beast Within
card.property: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them." —Euphemia, Nexus watcher

card.name: Fires of Yavimaya
card.property: Creatures you control have haste. Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Yavimaya lights the quickest path to battle.

card.name: Kazandu Refuge
card.property: Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Llanowar Reborn
card.property: Llanowar Reborn enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Graft 1 (This land enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this land onto it.)

card.name: Skarrg, the Rage Pits
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {R}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This palace will be our fire-spit, and roasted prince our victory meal. Send in the torch-pigs!" —Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage
